https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nQCgaSBubCROxGMxPApvjQ77LQI.jpg A documentary about youth politicians changes radically on July 22nd 2011, when a right-wing extremist murders 69 people at a summer camp run by the Workers Youth Party. Bravehearts
